DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to collect outcomes data in patients implanted with the Ellipse IM HTO Nail System.
DOC.brief_title: Ellipse Intramedullary High Tibial Osteotomy Nail Study
DOC.criteria: Patient implanted with the Ellipse IM HTO Nail System for osteoarthritis and varus malalignment of the knee Patient signs informed consent for the use of their personal private data. Patient is currently enrolled in another clinical trial for high tibial osteotomy.
